title: defaultGeometrySchema
description: Used in stores where all ArrayBufferView geometry declarations use the same pattern for face and vertex elements. Reduces redundancies of ArrayBufferView geometry declarations in a store. Reuses the GeometryAttribute type from FeatureData; however, only valueType and valuesPerElement are mandatory.

geometryType.description: Low-level default geometry type, one of {triangles, lines, points}. If defined, all geometries in the store are expected to have this type.

enum-description.Indexed: When Indexed, the indices must also be declared in the geometry schema (faces) and precede the vertexAttribute data.

header.description: Defines header fields in the Geometry resources of this store that precede the vertex (and index) data.

vertexAttributes.description: Declaration of the attributes per vertex in the geometry, such as position, normals or texture coordinates.

faces.description: Declaration of the indices into vertex attributes that define faces in the geometry, such as position, normals or texture coordinates.

featureAttributeOrder.description: Provides the order of the keys in featureAttributes, if present.

featureAttributes.description: Declaration of the attributes per feature in the geometry, such as feature ID or face range.
